Author: Alexithymia115
Text: You make it stop by choosing to make it stop and you make that choice by finding someone to help you make it stop. I've been in this game for a decade. For six years I couldn't make it stop on my own for longer than a few months at a time (yay seasonal depression!) The only time I successfully recovered was with therapy. I know what it feels like for it to stop and I'm DESPERATELY trying to get back there. I've tasted quiet and it is PHENOMENAL.

Author: macespacee
Text: I can only relate to your struggle.. one thing that has helped me is meditating and working on wellness outside of my body . Yoga and healthy relationships
